verses.verse: <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3326>After<s%> the <S%G2351>uproar<s%> had <S%G3973>ceased,<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> sent <S%G4341>for<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> took <S%G782>leave<s%> of <S%G1831>them,<s%> and departed to <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia.<s%>

<S%G1161>When<s%> he had gone <S%G1330>through<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G3313>parts,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> had <S%G3870>encouraged<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> with <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G3056>words,<s%> he <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1671>Greece.<s%>

<S%G5037><s%> When he had <S%G4160>spent<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G3376>months<s%> <S%G1096>there,<s%> and <S%G5259><s%> a <S%G1917>plot<s%> was made against <S%G846>him<s%> by <S%G2453>Jews<s%> as he was <S%G3195>about<s%> to set <S%G321>sail<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G4947>Syria,<s%> <S%G1096>he<s%> <S%G1106>determined<s%> to <S%G5290>return<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia.<s%>

<S%G1161>These<s%> <S%G4902>accompanied<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> as far <S%G891>as<s%> <S%G773>Asia:<s%> <S%G4986>Sopater<s%> of <S%G961>Beroea;<s%> <S%G1161><s%> <S%G708>Aristarchus<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G4580>Secundus<s%> of the <S%G2331>Thessalonians;<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1050>Gaius<s%> of <S%G1190>Derbe;<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5095>Timothy;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5190>Tychicus<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G5161>Trophimus<s%> of <S%G774>Asia.<s%>
But <S%G3778>these<s%> had gone <S%G4281>ahead,<s%> and were <S%G3306>waiting<s%> for <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G5174>Troas.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G2249>We<s%> sailed <S%G1602>away<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G5375>Philippi<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%> of Unleavened <S%G106>Bread,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1519>at<s%> <S%G5174>Troas<s%> <S%G891>in<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> we <S%G1304>stayed<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2250>days.<s%>

<S%G1722><s%> <S%G1161>On<s%> the <S%G1520>first<s%> day of the <S%G4521>week,<s%> <S%G4863>when<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> were gathered <S%G4863>together<s%> to <S%G2806>break<s%> <S%G740>bread,<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G1256>talked<s%> with <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3195>intending<s%> to <S%G1826>depart<s%> on the next <S%G1887>day,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G3905>continued<s%> his <S%G3056>speech<s%> <S%G3360>until<s%> <S%G3317>midnight.<s%>
<S%G1161>There<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G2425>many<s%> <S%G2985>lights<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the upper <S%G5253>room<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> we <S%G2258>were<s%> gathered <S%G4863>together.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> A <S%G5100>certain<s%> young <S%G3494>man<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G2161>Eutychus<s%> <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> the <S%G2376>window,<s%> weighed <S%G2702>down<s%> with <S%G901>deep<s%> <S%G5258>sleep.<s%> <S%G1909>As<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G1256>spoke<s%> <S%G1256>still<s%> <S%G4119>longer,<s%> being weighed <S%G2702>down<s%> <S%G575>by<s%> his <S%G5258>sleep,<s%> he fell <S%G4098>down<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the third <S%G5152>story,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> was <S%G142>taken<s%> <S%G2736>up<s%> <S%G3498>dead.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> went <S%G2597>down,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G1968>fell<s%> upon <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4843>embracing<s%> him <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G3361>"Don't<s%> be <S%G2350>troubled,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5590>life<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>"

<S%G1161>When<s%> he had gone <S%G305>up,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> had <S%G2806>broken<s%> <S%G740>bread,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G1089>eaten,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> had <S%G3656>talked<s%> with them <S%G1909>a<s%> long <S%G2425>while,<s%> even <S%G891>until<s%> break of <S%G827>day,<s%> <S%G3779>he<s%> <S%G1831>departed.<s%>
<S%G1161>They<s%> <S%G71>brought<s%> the <S%G3816>boy<s%> in <S%G2198>alive,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3870>were<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3357>greatly<s%> <S%G3870>comforted.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> who went <S%G4281>ahead<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> the <S%G4143>ship<s%> set <S%G321>sail<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G789>Assos,<s%> <S%G3195>intending<s%> to <S%G353>take<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> aboard <S%G1564>there,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> he <S%G2258>had<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G1299>arranged,<s%> <S%G3195>intending<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> to go by <S%G3978>land.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G5613>When<s%> he <S%G4820>met<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G1519>at<s%> <S%G789>Assos,<s%> we <S%G353>took<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G353>aboard,<s%> and <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3412>Mitylene.<s%>

<S%G636>Sailing<s%> from <S%G2547>there,<s%> we <S%G2658>came<s%> the <S%G1966>following<s%> day <S%G481>opposite<s%> <S%G5508>Chios.<s%> <S%G1161>The<s%> <S%G1966>next<s%> day we <S%G3846>touched<s%> <S%G1519>at<s%> <S%G4544>Samos<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3306>stayed<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G5175>Trogyllium,<s%> and the day <S%G2192>after<s%> we <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3399>Miletus.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> had <S%G2919>determined<s%> to sail <S%G3896>past<s%> <S%G2181>Ephesus,<s%> <S%G3704>that<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1096>might<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> have to spend <S%G5551>time<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G773>Asia;<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> he was <S%G4692>hastening,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> it <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G1415>possible<s%> for <S%G846>him,<s%> to <S%G1096>be<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> on the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G4005>Pentecost.<s%>
<S%G1161><s%> <S%G575>From<s%> <S%G3399>Miletus<s%> he <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2181>Ephesus,<s%> and <S%G3333>called<s%> to himself the <S%G4245>elders<s%> of the <S%G1577>assembly.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G5613>When<s%> they had <S%G3854>come<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G5210>"You<s%> yourselves <S%G1987>know,<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G2250><s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> I set <S%G1910>foot<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G773>Asia,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> I <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G5550>time,<s%>

<S%G1398>serving<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5012>humility,<s%> <S%G2532>with<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1144>tears,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> with <S%G3986>trials<s%> which <S%G4819>happened<s%> to <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G1917>plots<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews;<s%>

<S%G5613>how<s%> I <S%G5288>didn't<s%> shrink from declaring to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3762>anything<s%> that was <S%G4851>profitable,<s%> <S%G1321>teaching<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1219>publicly<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2596>from<s%> house to <S%G3624>house,<s%>

<S%G1263>testifying<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> to <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G1672>Greeks<s%> <S%G3341>repentance<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G5547><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G3568>Now,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G1210>bound<s%> by the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1492>knowing<s%> <S%G3588>what<s%> <S%G1722><s%> will <S%G4876>happen<s%> to <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G846>there;<s%>

<S%G4133>except<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1263>testifies<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> every <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1199>bonds<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2347>afflictions<s%> <S%G3306>wait<s%> for <S%G3165>me.<s%>

<S%G235>But<s%> these <S%G3056>things<s%> <S%G3762>don't<s%> <S%G4160>count;<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> do <S%G2192>I<s%> hold <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5590>life<s%> <S%G5093>dear<s%> to <S%G1683>myself,<s%> <S%G5613>so<s%> that <S%G2192>I<s%> may <S%G5048>finish<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> race <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5479>joy,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1248>ministry<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2983>received<s%> from the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> to fully <S%G1263>testify<s%> to the Good <S%G2098>News<s%> of the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G3568>"Now,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G1330>went<s%> about <S%G2784>preaching<s%> the <S%G932>Kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> will <S%G3700>see<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%> no <S%G3765>more.<s%>

<S%G1352>Therefore<s%> <S%G1722>I<s%> <S%G3143>testify<s%> <S%G1722>to<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G4594>this<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> am <S%G2513>clean<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of all <S%G3956>men,<s%>
<S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G5288>I<s%> <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G5288>shrink<s%> <S%G3361>from<s%> <S%G312>declaring<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> the <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G1012>counsel<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

Take <S%G4337>heed,<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> to <S%G1438>yourselves,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4168>flock,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> has <S%G5087>made<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1985>overseers,<s%> to <S%G4165>shepherd<s%> the <S%G1577>assembly<s%> of the Lord and <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G4046>purchased<s%> <S%G1223>with<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G129>blood.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G867>departure,<s%> <S%G926>vicious<s%> <S%G3074>wolves<s%> will <S%G1525>enter<s%> in <S%G1519>among<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5339>sparing<s%> the <S%G4168>flock.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G435>Men<s%> <S%G435>will<s%> <S%G450>arise<s%> from <S%G1537>among<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> own <S%G846>selves,<s%> <S%G2980>speaking<s%> perverse <S%G1294>things,<s%> to draw <S%G645>away<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

<S%G1352>Therefore<s%> <S%G1127>watch,<s%> <S%G3421>remembering<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> for a period of three <S%G5148>years<s%> I <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G3973>cease<s%> to <S%G3560>admonish<s%> <S%G1538>everyone<s%> <S%G1520><s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1144>tears.<s%>
Now, brothers, I entrust you to God, and to the word of his grace, which is able to build up, and to give you the inheritance among all those who are sanctified.
I coveted no one's silver, or gold, or clothing.
You yourselves know that these hands served my necessities, and those who were with me.
In all things I gave you an example, that so laboring you ought to help the weak, and to remember the words of the Lord Jesus, that he himself said, "'It is more blessed to give than to receive.'"
When he had spoken these things, he knelt down and prayed with them all.
They all wept a lot, and fell on Paul's neck and kissed him,
sorrowing most of all because of the word which he had spoken, that they should see his face no more. And they accompanied him to the ship.
